eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Skagit, WA; at 07:18 AM ON DEC 10, 2025 Effective until 09:18 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: The following message is sent on behalf of Skagit County Emergency Management: Skagit Ready Alert: Residents along the Skagit and Samish Rivers GET SET for Imminent Evacuation. Historic flooding is expected. Pack your go bag, prepare your property, and BE PREPARED TO EVACUATE. Roads may be closed due to high water, plan your route to high ground away from the river.
